house_listing.house_description: Anthony michael model. 1st floor owner's suite w/ 3 addt'l br's upstairs. 2-story fmr is open to eat-in kitchen with planning desk. Many architectural details including arched openings, columns & niche, std. Features include full brick exterior, tile entry & bath floors. Side-load garage, deck.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Foyer, GarageDoor Opener, Pantry, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
